Package vehicles

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDriveOutput
    The abstract class all DriveOutputs inherit from.
    AbstractSensor
    The abstract class every Sensor inherits from.
    AbstractSensors
    The abstract class all Sensors inherit from.
    AbstractSource
    The abstract class every Source inherits from.
    AbstractVehicle
    The abstract class every Vehicle inherits from.
    AbstractWorld
    The abstract world for the vehicles simulation.
    Controller
    Runs the World, Threaded so the animation works.
    LightSensor
    A light sensor!
    LightSource
    The only type of Source we have; Light
    MyDriveOutput
    A vanilla drive output Just copies the inputs to the outputs If you were implementing, say, the Love vehicle, you would subtract the inputs from the default drive values here!
    MySensors
    A non-abstract vanilla Sensor pair
    ProtoVehicle
    A prototype Vehicle.
    ProtoWorld
    A prototype world for testing purposes
    SensorList
    The list of Sensors (for a Vehicle)
    SourceList
    The list of Sources (for the whole world)
    VehicleApp
    The applet for Vehicles.
    VehicleList
    An ArrayList of Vehicles
